             <td>
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="wb_con" id="wb_con__9823365656759" width="100%">
               <tr>
                <td class="wb_col" id="wb_col__97546248789" style="" valign="top" width="100%">
                 <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_text__1381465876250_92" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td align="left">
                    <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__1381465876250_92">
                     <div>
                      <p style="width: auto;">
                       <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif" size="4" style="width: auto;">
                        <span style="width: auto;">
                         <font size="5" style="width: auto;">
                          <font id="ext-gen20179" style="width: auto;">
                           Pine Lake Trout Club Is Waiving Initiation Fees Until
                          </font>
                         </font>
                        </span>
                       </font>
                       <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                        <font size="5">
                        </font>
                       </font>
                       <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif" size="5">
                        <br/>
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="width: auto;">
                       <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif" size="5">
                        September 1, 2018
                       </font>
                       <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                        <br/>
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p id="ext-gen11493" style="width: auto;">
                       <font face="garamond, georgia, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif" size="4" style="width: auto;">
                        <font color="#FFFFFF" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                         <span style="width: auto;">
                          <font size="5" style="width: auto;">
                           <font style="width: auto;">
                            <font style="width: auto;">
                             Please See Membership Information Page For More Deta
                            </font>
                            i
                            <font style="width: auto;">
                             ls.
                            </font>
                           </font>
                          </font>
                         </span>
                        </font>
                        <b style="width: auto;">
                         <br/>
                        </b>
                       </font>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                 <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_text__523451" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td align="left">
                    <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__523451">
                     <div>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        Pine Lake Trout Club is a private fishing club located in Bainbridge Township, Ohio.
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        Membership is available in several flexible categories including Resident, Non-Resident and Corporate.
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        Nestled in the woods are
                        <font face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif">
                         four
                        </font>
                        overnight cabins with fully equipped kitchens and wood burning fireplaces. All of our cabins are pet friendly. Do you need a retreat for a few days or a unique spot for a business meeting?  Pine Lake Trout Club is your answer.
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 
 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', 
 serif" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        The Reading House Banquet Room seats up to 100 people for that special social gathering and Conference Cabin #1 is an ideal location for meetings and private dinners up to 20 people.
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="Georgia" size="3">
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font color="#ffffff" face="Georgia" size="3" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        The quiet and cozy Log Cabin Dining Room offers members and their guests friendly service and a creative food selection, serving lunch and dinner six days a week.
                       </font>
                      </p>
                      <p style="WIDTH: auto">
                       <font class="yss_save_1278956424912" color="#000000" face="georgia,palatino" size="3" style="LINE-HEIGHT: normal; WIDTH: auto">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif" style="WIDTH: auto">
                         <br/>
                         The cozy member lounge with its large brick fireplace is the ideal place for family, friends or business associates.
                        </font>
                       </font>
                       <font size="2" style="WIDTH: auto">
                        <br/>
                       </font>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                 <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_pa__1349579862703_24" width="100%">
